h3_title: The Zodiac Village of the Painted Realm
content: While it can't be upgraded from its base of 36% health restored, it not only increases your movement speed after drinking, but can hold up to three different Soaks, making it an incredibly versatile Gourd Drink to equip for boss fights!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Chen Loong' and the sub-subsection 'The Zodiac Village of the Painted Realm'.
The content is as follows:
While it can't be upgraded from its base of 36% health restored, it not only increases your movement speed after drinking, but can hold up to three different Soaks, making it an incredibly versatile Gourd Drink to equip for boss fights!
